## AbstractSegment.boundingBoxIntersection() method

Computes the list of points on the segment that intersect the given bounding box, which is an object of the form { x:.., y:.., w:.., h:.. }<!-- -->.  lineIntersection

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
boundingBoxIntersection(box: BoundingBox): Array<PointXY>;
```
